line: inspire Home isn’t where you land; home is where you launch. You can’t pick your home any more than you can choose your family. In poker, you get five cards. Three of them you can swap out, but two are yours to keep: family and native land.
author: Tayari Jones

line: inspire To choose doubt as a philosophy of life is akin to choosing immobility as a means of transportation.
author: Yann Martel

line: inspire The gods grow jealous of too much contentment anywhere, and they show their displeasure all of a sudden.
author: R. K. Narayan
